#  Billy Cli

## 📦 Installation 

```console
npm i -g @fivethree/billy-cli
```

# BillyCLI
#### 
# Lanes
Index|Name|Description
---|---|---
1|create_app|start a new billy cli app! 🚀
2|create_plugin|create a new plugin 🧩
3|install_plugin|install a plugin into your billy 👾
4|remove_plugin|remove a plugin from your project ♻
5|build_app|build your billy app 🏗
6|clean_app|clean install your billy app 👷
7|run_app|run your billy app 🏃
8|info|info about this application
### 1. create_app
start a new billy cli app! 🚀

### 2. create_plugin
create a new plugin 🧩

### 3. install_plugin
install a plugin into your billy 👾

### 4. remove_plugin
remove a plugin from your project ♻

### 5. build_app
build your billy app 🏗

### 6. clean_app
clean install your billy app 👷

### 7. run_app
run your billy app 🏃

### 8. info
info about this application
